title: Chris Harman - A People's History of the World [epub]
description:
A People's History of the World - From the Stone Age to the New Millennium


The only comprehensive "bottom up" history of the world from the earliest human society to the twenty-first century.

Chris Harman describes the shape and course of human history as a narrative of ordinary people forming and re-forming complex societies in pursuit of common human goals.
